message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. It's a good deal for both of us.
Your split seems unfair to me. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor. Take it or leave it, the clock is ticking.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. Let's meet in the middle of our previous offers.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer before inflation eats away at your share even more.
